author: markt
msg: Fix webDAV servlet so it can be used via any arbitrary mapping
(eg /webdav/*) to edit the contents of a web application

author: markt
msg: Fix bug 31201. When including static files with <jsp:include ...> platform
default file encoding is no longer assumed for the static file. This was
causing i18m issues, particularly for Japanese users.
- Patch supplied (with minor mods) by Takayuki Kaneko

author: remm
msg: - Remove the remove method, and use the undeploy methos instead.

author: remm
msg: - 32729: stop is optional and may fail, so it needs to be in a separate try/catch.
